doc.title: Registration for the next Food Photography Workshop is now opened
doc.text: Many/JJ readers/NNS have/VBP been/VBN writing/VBG in/IN about/IN wanting/VBG to/TO attend/VB the/DT food/NN photography/NN workshop/NN ,/, so/RB we/PRP are/VBP organizing/VBG the/DT next/JJ one/CD in/IN July/NNP !/. This/DT time/NN round/NN ,/, we/PRP will/MD be/VB holding/VBG it/PRP at/IN Tetsu/NN Japanese/NN Restaurant/NN ,/, and/CC the/DT chef/NN has/VBZ created/VBN a/DT menu/NN specially/RB for/IN our/PRP$ session/NN !/.
